Data: epic welding contact us project gallery services about us home our services welding mig welding up to 450a stick welding up to 400a cnc plasma cutting 12ft press brake forming plate shearing 1/4 x 10 sawing cap 18 x 18 punching & notching aluminum & stainless steel need more details call us now 701-730-1764 imagine what we can build together epic welding & mfg is a full service welding and fabrication shop located in west fargo nd we can take your projects from proto-type design to finished products with over 20 years experience in the manufacturing industry our experienced staff we can handle your 1-10 piece orders or your 1-1000 pieces; depending on what your requirements are at the time of an order as a custom metal fabrictor every job we build is unique and tailor made to our customers specifications with quantity ranging from an individual prototype to small and medium sized manufacturing runs among our many finished products we commonly build trailors ag equipment and pipe work just some of the services we provide at our location are forming shearing plate shear brake press vertical saw and plasma cutting as well as tig and mig welding as well as heavy plate fabrication we also provide assembly of your products from industrial to agriculture if you are new to epic welding & mfg we welcome a phone call to explore how we might be able to help you or feel free to stop by for a tour and answer any further questions you may have about our capabilities

epic welding contact us project gallery services about us home our services welding mig welding up to 450a stick welding up to 400a cnc plasma cutting 12ft press brake forming plate shearing 1/4 x 10 sawing cap 18 x 18 punching & notching aluminum & stainless steel need more details call us now 701-730-1764 our services at epic welding & mfg our capabilities are limited by the ability to dream better faster more efficient ways to do things utilizing state-of-the-art metal forming equipment manned by a team of highly talented metal workers it is hard to find a job that is too big or small for us to take on many items we produce are one off prototypes which often times turn into full on manufacturing runs a partial list of our capabilities: cnc plasma cutting up to 1 mild steel press brake forming of all types of material up to 12 plate shearing 1/4 x 10 sawing cap 18 x 18 marvel vertical saw straight cutsas well as 45 deg cuts mig welding up to 450 amp stick welding up to 400 amp we also weld aluminum & stainless steel punching and notching is also offered at our location now offering new sand blasting & paint services: 18 x 18 x 70 ft paint booth cross draft system elect stat guns to apply paint 1 pro mix automated paint blender for epoxy 2 part paint painting of industrial equipment referbof equipment trailers to pay loaders to structual steel 50 x 100 blast bldwith industrial blast pot 2- 4200 psi airless paint units portable epic welding & mfg also works with powder coating paint shops in the area we can get your products painted to the correct spec we can take your idea to finished product give us a cal now
